text: Keep the charts simple. There is beauty and simplicity in the long-reduid this, the more you realize the efficacy behind what seems to be blatantly obvious. But the problem is price, volume, moving averages, support and resistance. That'll get you most of the way there for most trading. Sure, you can take her with different things, but don't chase your tail for years, trying to find the secret sauce. The unknown indicator that leads to a hundred percent success rate because it doesn't exist. And as soon as there is such an indicator, you'll know about it, because everybody's going to use it because who wouldn't. This simple things can get you pretty close without all of the noise being out there, see you later.
